sentences.english: Even when we reduce the salt to a fine powder , it will taste well.
sentences.chinese: 即使我们把盐研磨成很小的粉末，他尝起来还是咸的。

sentences.english: It's too salty-tonight's dish, I must keep drinking more water.
sentences.chinese: 今晚的菜很咸，害得我饭后要不停的喝水。

sentences.english: When a white mycelium develops, the cubes, are aged in salted rice wine.
sentences.chinese: 当白色菌丝形成后，豆腐块被放在咸的米酒中成熟。

sentences.english: Salt is good, but if it loses its saltiness, how can you make it salty again?
sentences.chinese: 盐本是好的，若失了味，可用什么叫它再咸呢？

sentences.english: You are the salt of the earth, but if the salt loses its savor, with what shall it be salted?
sentences.chinese: 你们是世上的盐。盐若失了味，怎能叫他再咸呢？

sentences.english: Chapter one describes the social situation in Shandong in Daoguang and Xianfeng period.
sentences.chinese: 第一章，主要讲述道咸时期山东社会状况。

sentences.english: Cajun food is often very salty and spicy.
sentences.chinese: 路易斯安那州的菜肴，通常都是即咸又辣。

sentences.english: Salt is good: but if the salt have lost his savour, wherewith shall it be seasoned?
sentences.chinese: 盐本来是好的，但如果失了味，怎能使它再咸呢？

sentences.english: It is so salty that you can't sink when you are in the water.
sentences.chinese: 那里的水很咸，当你在水中时，你不会沉下去。

sentences.english: The whole ocean is salty, and you are trying to be sweet.
sentences.chinese: 整个海洋是咸的，而你却想成为甜的。

sentences.english: You are the salt of the earth. But if the salt loses its saltiness，how can it be made salty again？
sentences.chinese: 你们是世上的盐，盐若失了味，怎能叫他再咸呢？

sentences.english: Pickled ginger is at once sweet, tart, and salty. It is served with Japanese sushi.
sentences.chinese: 甜酸带咸的腌姜，是日本寿司的好搭配。

sentences.english: I say, waiter, the soup is too salty.
The lake of cold, slightly salty, crabs appropriate growth.
sentences.chinese: 湖水性冷，稍咸，适宜螃蟹生长。

sentences.english: So rich are the sweet and salty delicacies that few would eat their way through an entire gift pack on their own.
sentences.chinese: 那么多又甜又咸的月饼很少有能自己全吃完的。

sentences.english: Beer is a good choice if the salty moon cakes also tasted spicy.
sentences.chinese: 如果咸月饼味带辛辣，配啤酒也不错。

definition: sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid
to stew in soy sauce and spices
five spice seasoned/incorporating the five basic flavors of Chinese cooking (sweet, sour, bitter, savory, salty)
soup/hot or boiling water/decoction of medicinal herbs/water in which sth has been boiled
